meta.@content: Arleigh Burke Prototype model without missiles and corresponding routes, built for USS Cole Model. Click on ship's hull to trigger explosion on port side.
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

ExternProtoDeclare.@appinfo: Prototype to explode different pieces and parts in different ways.

field.@appinfo: geometry node, to be used inside a Shape
Material node for this geometry, to be used inside a Shape

-children.#comment: Flight deck nets netting from VRML 2.0 source book as cited in the header of the file. If over 8000 meters from flight deck do not draw it
Directors based on TRC-170 model from Savage.
Gun is based on Cruiser model from Savage.
